LanguageData.JJH_BackstoryClanMaudraChild.title: Maudra child
LanguageData.JJH_BackstoryClanMaudraChild.baseDescrip: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to the leader of their clan
LanguageData.JJH_BackstoryEldestMaudraDaughter.title: Maudra Protegie
LanguageData.JJH_BackstoryEldestMaudraDaughter.baseDe: [PAWN_nameDef] is the eldest daughter to the leader of her clan
LanguageData.JJH_BackstoryGelflingAllMaudra.title: Gelfling All Maudra
LanguageData.JJH_BackstoryGelflingAllMaudra.baseDescr: [PAWN_nameDef] is the voice of the Gelfling, appointed by the Skeksis
LanguageData.JJH_BackstoryFarmerChild.title: Farmer's Child
LanguageData.JJH_BackstoryFarmerChild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to a farmer who sold to a nearby clan
LanguageData.JJH_BackstoryWarriorChild.title: Warrior's Child
LanguageData.JJH_BackstoryWarriorChild.baseDescriptio: [PAWN_nameDef] was born to a Gelfling that protects others.
LanguageData.JJH_BackstoryGelflingGuard.title: Guard of a Clan
LanguageData.JJH_BackstoryGelflingGuard.baseDescripti: [PAWN_nameDef] guards their clan and trains prospective Gelfling.
LanguageData.JJH_BackstoryFreeSpirit.title: Free Spirit
LanguageData.JJH_BackstoryFreeSpirit.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is not one for clan life, so they have taken to exploring the world in which they inhabit.
LanguageData.JJH_BackstoryClanMaudra.title: Clan Maudra
LanguageData.JJH_BackstoryClanMaudra.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] ascended to lead her clan when her mother died and now monitors the activities of her maudren.
LanguageData.JJH_BackstoryGelflingTrader.title: Wares Trader
LanguageData.JJH_BackstoryGelflingTrader.baseDescript: [PAWN_nameDef] sells wares from clans to passing Gelfling, allowing for a spread of culture.
